sourcesContent:
import { Container } from "./style"; import { useResults } from "../../providers/Results"; export const MoreModal = ({ user, handleClose }) => { const { userDetail } = useResults() const date = Date.parse(userDetail.created_at) let dataFormatada = ((date.getDate())) + "/" + ((date.getMonth() + 1)) + "/" + date.getFullYear(); return (

{userDetail.name}

Username:

{userDetail.login}

Seguindo:

{userDetail.following}

Cadastrado(a):

{dataFormatada}

Seguidores

{userDetail.followers}

URL:

{userDetail.html_url}

 ) }
